properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.banner.color
properties.description: Text color of the banner

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.banner.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the custom banner

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.banner.location
properties.description: Path to the custom banner resource

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.controller.base-path
properties.description: Base path for REST endpoints.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.controller.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable generic controllers.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.entity.enable-auditing
properties.description: Enable or disable automatic entity auditing.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.entity.enable-soft-delete
properties.description: Enable or disable soft delete functionality.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.entity.lifecycle-events-enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable entity lifecycle events.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.entity.system-username
properties.description: Default name to use for system actions when no user is authenticated.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.repository.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable custom repository functionality.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.service.enable-validation
properties.description: Enable validation at service layer.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.domain.service.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable service layer.

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.logging.base-package
properties.description: Package name to apply logging to (defaults to your base package)

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.logging.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable the custom logging

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.logging.entity-lifecycle-logging
properties.description: Enable or disable logging for entity lifecycle events

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.logging.level
properties.description: Logging level for the application Valid values: TRACE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.logging.mask-sensitive-data
properties.description: Enable or disable log masking for sensitive data

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.logging.pattern
properties.description: Pattern to use for logging

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.logging.request-logging
properties.description: Enable or disable HTTP request logging

properties.name: io.joshuasalcedo.common.logging.sql-logging
properties.description: Enable or disable SQL query logging
